div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1102 Cherronesus (near mod. Sevastopol') environs, Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1970- 1971 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 1+ AR (and AE?). Pot hoard Cherronesus: 1 didr. (as Zograph, pl. 35, 22; the only coin known) Disposition: dispersed Information from A. M. Gilevich
